meta.description: Creating free, ad-free, and accessible tools that simplify life.

about.title: About Us
about.content: York Development is dedicated to creating apps that bring convenience to your daily life. We believe in providing tools that are simple, user-friendly, and accessible to everyone.

york.title: York (Founder/Developer)
york.bio: A hobby developer from Taiwan with a passion for creating tools that make life simpler.

yorknotify.description: A seamless way to schedule notifications on your iOS devices.

temposync.description: A simple metronome app designed to help musicians keep time while playing.

tomato.description: A simple Pomodoro timer to help you stay focused and productive.

lottery.name: 免費抽獎
